# 2 The Rescue Animal Sanctuary Inc. Website

## Description

This is the website for 2 The Rescue Animal Sanctuary, based in Ramona, CA. The sanctuary homes all sorts of animals from horses to cows to goats to peacocks.

Through this website, you can learn more about the animal sanctuary, its animals, how to visit, volunteer and donate.

## Features

    Personality Quiz: Take the personality quiz to get matched to an animal! Each answer gives you points towards one of the 7 results, and whichever has the highest amount of points is your match. Once you see your result, you have the option to set up a monthly sponsorship for that animal.

    MongoDB: A MongoDB is used to store all the animal information. Through the admin terminal, you are able to add, delete and edit all of the animals in the database. AWS is used to store image information.

    Donations: Stripe was integrated to allow the user to send donations. You can donae once, monthly or set up a monthly sponsorship to a specific animal. The default donations are $5, $25 and $50 but you also have the option to donate a custom number.

    Contact: The contact utilizes resend, so the user can fill out their information, click send, and an email with all of their information will be sent to the owner of the website.

    Tailwind: Tailwind was used to design the site, utilizing a dynamic navbar.

## Usage

The site can be visited at 2therescueanimalsanctuary.org. Navigate to different pages through the tabs, and try out our personality quiz which will match you to one of the animals!

## Credits

2therescueanimalsanctuary.org was built with Next.js, Tailwind, Resend, Multer, Stripe, AWS S3, and MongoDB.
